title: Is it permissible to have a list of dead family members so I can give sadaqah on their behalf? assim
transcript:
[Questioner] from the UK would it be permissible 
to have a list of our relatives our family i.e.   our mum dad our deceased our family member on 
the paper on or on the notepad so whenever I   want to give sadaqa refer to the paper with 
our niyya saying oh I'm giving sadaqa or it's   not verbally though having the niyya I'm giving 
the sadaqa on behalf of the people listed on the   list and also can we give sadaqa on behalf of 
people who might have wronged in the past let   me understand your question [ __ ]so you're 
asking me is it permissible to write a list   of the people I want to give charity on their 
behalf yes and also going forward anytime I   want to do sadaqa we just refer to the list of 
the people in the list rather than opening up   the list or looking at names there is there is 
no problem in that none whatsoever inshallah and have you ever taken a counseling session with 
me go to my website and you will find counseling   sessions and apply for one if you can afford it 
that's good for you if you cannot you're entitled   for one free session and this is for everybody 
if they can affirm by Allah that they cannot   afford it because they're poor I'll give them 
one free session without a problem a full half   an hour so come to me and let's speak about 
it inshallah within the following two days   or three days I will uh try and seek Allah's 
guidance to solve the problem once and for All
